meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used as a pesticide.
meanings.sent1: The metaldehyde effectively kept the garden free from pests.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use metaldehyde to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ants avoided the metaldehyde-treated area like it was a forbidden zone.
meanings.sent4: The metaldehyde acted like a shield, warding off any unwanted bugs from the plants.
meanings.sent5: The metaldehyde sparkled in the sunlight, a silent protector of the garden.

meanings.definition: To treat with metaldehyde to control pests.
meanings.sent1: She carefully metaldehyde-treated the soil to ensure the plants stayed safe.
meanings.sent2: The farmers metaldehyde their fields regularly to prevent insect infestations.
meanings.sent3: The pests were in for a surprise as the farmer decided to metaldehyde their territory.
meanings.sent4: The garden was like a fortress after she metaldehyde-treated it against invaders.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, he metaldehyde-sprayed the area, protecting it from harm.
